summary: Motivated customer service professional with retail leadership experience, strong communication and merchandising skills. Proven ability to coach staff, manage operations, handle cash, and deliver excellent customer experiences under pressure.
skills: Ability to work under pressure and to tight deadlines

experience.title: Acting Grade 4 Customer/Brand
experience.description: Coached and developed staff; ensured store operations were fulfilled; maintained open communication with management; trained and coached associates; monitored floor coverage and workloads; maintained positive work environment; performed tasks assigned by on-duty leader; managed Gapcards, Media Ambassador duties, and weekly safety audits; oversaw shipments, merchandising, and timely refreshers; kept stockroom organized and visuals up to date.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Delivered excellent customer service; advised customers on styles, fits, and products; stayed informed about promotions and sister store; maintained store standards; executed operational processes; promoted Gapcards and benefits of cardholder programs.

experience.title: Nights and Weekend Manager
experience.description: Opened/closed the store; counted cash drawers and made bank deposits; built and maintained relationships with peers and management; directed and coached team members; held staff accountable for performance goals; attended monthly meetings; informed customers about products and services; led marketing initiatives to maximize sales; maintained structured and peaceful workplace.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Provided exceptional service throughout the shopping experience; balanced multiple customers in a fast-paced environment; kept store clean and stock organized; advised customers on suitable products and services; selected as product demo and party host; processed sales transactions accurately and promptly.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Psychology and Communication
